lines.text: Hold it. You can't go in there, lady. There's been a hold-up and a murder.
You're wrong, boys. Hold-ups and murder are my meat. Here's the open sesame that swings wide all portals - my press pass. Torchy Blane of the Star.

[to Torchy]
Well, newshound, you got your ears pinned back.
No, just a little quiet mayhem.
